definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="stimulation" type="Boolean">stimulation</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%).
